black.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

brilliantGreen.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

brightOrange.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

jade.description: origin BASE (was originally #008146, darkened by 2% black, then changed from 008147 to 008047 to be AAA against FFFFFF bg)

lightJade.description: AAA text on 000000 bgs. This is deliberately NOT named bright.

transparent.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

white.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

SCALE.description: SCALE is the base-scale of all size-related tokens (size, space, dimension). It's set to 8px as this is our default multiplier used across the majority of components. If you change it, it will change all size-related tokens.

near.description: Popover menus used on split, multiaction, dropdown and action popovers

scale.description: We can override this to locally change the size of radius in the future if required.

M.description: Popover menus (action popover, split button etc), Color picker standard (container), Menu (bottom corners), Message, Navigation: top (menu bottom corners), Navigation: left (selected menu), Pagination, Table, Tile (less rounded), Toast

L.description: Carousel (outer part), Color picker advanced (outer container), Dialog (not full screen), Tile (more rounded).

S.description: Button: minor (including button bar), Button: multi-action & split (menu), Button toggle: minor, Checkbox (large), Date picker, Date range, Dropdown: select (trigger & menu), File input, Link (focus), Search, Text area, Text input.

M.description: Anchor navigation items, Card (less rounded), Card select (single), Card select group (outer corners), Carousel (slides), Tab items

XL.description: Buttons, Loader bar, Progress tracker, Switch

none.description: Button groups (internal/adjacent corners), Card select group (internal/adjacent corners), File input (integrated base bar top corners).

withHover.description: hover for draggable area on file input

hoverAlt.description: bg hover for draggable area on file input

defaultAlt.description: Disabled input and button backgrounds, button borders and input backgrounds.

content.description: Disabled text inside buttons and form inputs.

defaultAlt.description: Disabled button backgrounds and borders ON DARK

hoverAlt.description: Accordion and menu bg on hover

withHover.description: maybe should be white to align with primary group logic

hoverAlt.description: Accordion and menu bg on hover
Hover used on secondary and tertiary buttons

XXL.description: color picker items on hover, Small file preview thumbnails

XXS.description: top and bottom padding on small buttons

XS.description: top and bottom padding on medium buttons

S.description: top and bottom padding on large buttons

M.description: left and right padding on small buttons

L.description: left and right padding on Medium buttons

XL.description: left and right padding on large buttons

XS.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

S.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

L.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

XL.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

XXL.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

XXXL.description: min and max widths for responsive tile items

M.description: width for the closed drawer state

L.description: Dialog, sidebar and drawer footer max-height

M.description: message and toast icon container width

underline.description: focus black underline on links and skiplink

M.description: Min height on M Inputs and M Dropdowns. Fixed height on Calendar days

bar.description: 2px validation bar used on errors and warnings

label-alt.description: used for '(optional)' text and hint text.

bg-alt.description: progress bar bg, text editor preview and text editor footer

icon-active.description: used on tick in color picker and selected tick on dropdowns

text-hover.description: text hover state when dragging a file over file input

bar-error.description: error bar to left of inputs

bar-warning.description: warning bar to left of inputs

S.description: Top nav child menu item min-height

M.description: global nav and horizontal nav container height
Left nav child menu item min-height
M progress tracker bar, M loader bar

XL.description: XL loader bar, L progress tracker bar

S.description: top and bottom padding on medium buttons

M.description: left and right padding on small buttons

L.description: left and right padding on Medium buttons
